document_data.name: Dannika Graysteel
document_data.mainbody: '''Dannika Graysteel''' was a scholar who studied nature and weather in the frozen lands of [[Icewind Dale]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possessions: She owned a ''[[lantern of tracking]]'' that was attuned to [[elemental]]s, an item that greatly helped her in her studies.
document_data.Activities: Dannika believed that she could better understand the intense weather that afflicted the [[Ten Towns]] by studying the elemental spirits known as [[chwinga]]s.
document_data.History: Dannika moved to the [[Ten Towns]] not long after it was afflicted by the [[Everlasting Rime]]. She looked to hire help in order to catch one of the chwingas, which were proving to be rather elusive.
